argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrg1ascl.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | subrg1ascl.a | |- A = ( algSc ` P ) |
| 3 |  | subrg1ascl.h | |- H = ( R |`s T ) |
| 4 |  | subrg1ascl.u | |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) |
| 5 |  | subrg1ascl.r | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | subrg1asclcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` U ) |
| 7 |  | subrg1asclcl.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 8 |  | subrg1asclcl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. K ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 10 | 1, 2 | #P_ply1ascl | |- A = ( algSc ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly H ) = ( 1o mPoly H ) |
| 12 |  | #P_1on | |- 1o e. On |
| 13 | 12 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> 1o e. On ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` H ) = ( PwSer1 ` H ) |
| 15 | 4, 14, 6 | #P_ply1bas | |- B = ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly H ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 10, 3, 11, 13, 5, 15, 7, 8 | #P_subrgasclcl | |- ( ph -> ( ( A ` X ) e. B <-> X e. T ) ) |
